name: Oleum animale
Relationship: Compare: PULS.; ARS.; SILIC.; SEPIA.Antidotes: CAMPH.; OP.

Respiratory: STITCHES IN BREAST FROM BEHIND FORWARD
Stomach: Sensation AS IF WATER WERE IN STOMACH; of coldness, of constriction, and of burning; better, eructations
Female: EARLY AND SCANT MENSTRUATION; flow black
Abdomen: Ineffectual urging to stool, with burning in anus
After stool, bruised pain in abdomen
Greenish urine, frequent and urgent want to urinate, with tenesmus and scanty emission
Nose: Watery, excoriating discharge; worse in open air
Head: Tearing pain, with sadness and irritability; worse after dinner; relieved by rubbing
Itching, burning vesicles; better, friction
Malar bones feel pulled forcibly upward
Migraine with polyuria
Extremities: Sprained feeling in small of back
Cracking of vertebrae on raising head
Fish-brine odor of sweat of heels
Male: Pain along spermatic cord to testicles
TESTICLES FEEL SEIZED AND PULLED FORCIBLY UPWARD; worse, right

details: Acts on the nervous system, especially on pneumogastric region. Useful in migraine and neuralgia of spermatic cord. Burning pains and stitches. "PULLED UPWARD" AND "FROM BEHIND FORWARD" PAINS.
dosage: Third to thirtieth potency and higher.
